LanguageData.ElectricalSpasm.label: electrical spasm
LanguageData.ElectricalSpasm.description: General spasms caused by multipile elictical discharges. It can cause an extreme pain along with paralysis due to muscle strains. However it dissipates quickly and can be deadly only if patient has to run away from something (or someone) already treating their life.
LanguageData.ElectricalSpasm.stages.slight_pain.label: slight pain
LanguageData.ElectricalSpasm.stages.paralysis.label: paralysis
LanguageData.InspirationHediff.label: inspiration
LanguageData.InspirationHediff.description: General improvement in mood and body condition. It may be placebo, but it surely does make person a better combatant.
LanguageData.InspirationHediff.stages.motivated.label: motivated
LanguageData.PacifierPTSD.label: post traumatic stress disorder
LanguageData.PacifierPTSD.description: Mental and behavioral disorder caused by traumatic event. Its symptoms include tremor, delirium, hallucinations and fatigue. At late stages it can cause extreme mental breaks.
LanguageData.PacifierPTSD.stages.bad_memories.label: bad memories
LanguageData.PacifierPTSD.stages.shock.label: shock
LanguageData.PacifierPTSD.stages.flashbacks.label: flashbacks
LanguageData.SoreThroat.label: sore throat
LanguageData.SoreThroat.description: Pain and irritation of the throat caused by yelling. Not dangerous, but will make person unable to speak loudly for some time.
LanguageData.SoreThroat.stages.mild.label: mild
LanguageData.SoreThroat.stages.moderate.label: moderate
